alt: Threshold is an experiential product, designed to be touched, observed, and perceived in a way that distinguishes it from other furnishings. It becomes a protagonist within the environment.
title: Threshold

alt: A bold, authoritative, and innovative visual identity that amplifies traits already present in the brand we know.
title: IDD

alt: Interaction is at the center of every experience; it is necessary for the objects that surround us to live in turn, so that they can shine at their best and live with their own light.
title: Redo

alt: A tribute to the printing of the Hypnerotomachia Poliphili.
title: Venissa

alt: Humans Jam reproduces, in different contexts, the expression of the form of perception.
title: Humans Jam

alt: Q Design Studios is a brand focused on delivering communication, prototyping, UI/UX design, photography, visual design, and much more.
title: Q Design Studios

alt: Rebirth is a living table. Its rough and weathered form seeks to reconnect with nature, which over the years reclaims what was taken from it.
title: Rebirth
